title: Familiar....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Shioriko~! Shioriko~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>M-, Mari-san!? How many times do I have to tell you that you need permission from the school before you come by a helicopter....!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Sorry~! I’ll do it next time! I’m lowering a ladder, so climb up here, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I rushed over here because I thought of a really fun activity that I want to do with you, Shioriko.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>And by that you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Trapeze using the helicopter! We’ll be wearing a safety harness, of course, so don’t worry. Let’s see.... Alright, safety harness on! I’m opening the door, okay~! We’re going to jump at 3!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you for the detailed explanation and the safety harness. But I haven’t said I’ll do it yet, you know!? Aaah, I’m starting to see that person.... someone who always does this to me.... like you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Come on, here we go! 1, 2, 3, jump!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
